name: Stylish Slack
description: Dark version of theme for Slack, likely outdated, I no longer use Slack. See Additional Info.
additional_info:
Version 1, May only work with Sidebar theme Hoth, likely only will work when logged in. Not everything is skinned out to dark, as I can't figure out some elements, but if I update this to include those, I will let everyone know.

Unlikely to ever update further.
